lines.text: [Terry introducing himself to Mary Beth's daughters for the first time]

[imitating Tarzan]
Me, Terry.
[points to one of the girls]
You?

[introducing herself]
Judith?

[still imitating Tarzan; points to Nora]
You?

[introducing herself]
Nora.

[mimicking an ape man]
Goooood.
[he leaves]
If a dog and a dolphin can get along, why can't our mom and his dad?
[after realizing that Jordan has left their apartment]

[over the answering machine]
Hi, dad. It's me. I've gone to look for Zeus.

[Zeus is in the back of Mary Beth's boat; breathing "burrito breath" on her and Becky]
Burritos? Do you smell burritos?

[chuckles]
Yeah,
[Zeus burps; Mary Beth and Becky turn to see him. Mary Beth recognizes him as the dog who ruined her morning]

[chagrined]
You little...

[petting Zeus; cooing]
Oh, you're so cute!
No, no, no, THIS dog is not cute. THIS DOG is the *Hound from Hell*!

[about Claude Carver]
*HE* should be working with *sharks*!

[Jordan comes in with a breakfast burrito on a plate;groggy]
Do I smell some dinner?

[deadpanned]
Breakfast.
I knew that.

[shouts]
JORDAN! COW BONE!

[to Becky; about marine biology job offers]
Great! Then that leaves to the Rocklen grant. If I don't get that, I'll be...
...Stalking goldfish at the local pet store.

[sarcastic]
Very funny, Claude.
I wasn't joking.
[first lines; Zeus the dog attempts to steal Mrs. Rice's morning news paper, but she gets it before he could]
Nice try, flea bag!
[Zeus has knocked Claude Carver's briefcase into the water]
Hey! Hey! What are you doing, or I'll kick you all the way to Miami!
[Zues has knocked Claude Carver into the water. drenched and unhappy, Claude climbs onto the boat where his two assistance are working in, with the camera in his mouth]
It's the creature from the Black Lagoon.
Yeah, dressed like Dr. Carver.
[They get back to their work]
[Claude pulls himself up into the boat and flings his brief case in. The two assistance ignore him]
Get me a towel.

[looking up]
The creature! Sir!
[Phil grabs a towel and rushes to Claude's assistance]

[about Zues]
I think Zues is a very special dog.
What do you mean?
He seems to have the talent of... interspecies communication.
Well, what's the big deal? I talk to Zeus all the time.
Ah! But Zeus is talking with my dolphin.

[excited]
You own a dolphin?
[Mary Beth laughs]

I don't any longer. Roxanne lives in the bay, but I sometimes take care of her. She used to live in a tank, we're trying to reintroduce her to the ocean. Now, the problem is... She hasn't taken to other dolphins. But, she seems to like your Zues

[to his assistant]
Phil, get my bag! will you?
